channel.title: The Dyer Laboratory
channel.description: Research on the spatial distribution of population and landscape genetic variation.

item.title: Moving Manuscripts from Hugo
item.dc:creator: Rodney Dyer
item.description: The use of Markdown for your site is very helpful but not alll markdown formats are the same. Here is how I moved from Hugo to rstudio::distill for the manuscripts section of the lab webpage.

item.title: Welcome to The Dyer Laboratory
item.dc:creator: Rodney Dyer
item.description: Welcome to the new format of the the Dyer Laboratory online website. It was getting time to clean things up and streamline the ability to post materials online. So here it is, now in cleaner RMarkdown than before.
